com.comphenix.xp.mods

Class CustomBlockProviders

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.xp.extra.ServiceProvider<BlockService>
      • com.comphenix.xp.mods.CustomBlockProviders

  • public class CustomBlockProviders
extends ServiceProvider<BlockService>
    Represents a registry of custom block providers.

    The default service will be the first to process inventory events.

    Author:
    Kristian

      • processInventoryClick

        public BlockResponse processInventoryClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event,
                                  ItemQuery block)
        Processes the given inventory click event with every registered block service, starting with the default block service.
        Parameters:
        event - - inventory click event to process.
        block - - last right-clicked block.
